page.title: 13THE VILLAGE POST OFFICE
page.content: Miltonduff Post Office sells more than just stamps.It stocks a variety of household goods and is a meeting place for the community. The busiest days are Mondays and Tuesdays.Christmas is its busiest time of the year. Most people said that the Post Office gave a good service and the fact that you didn't have to queue up was much appreciated. "The service is good and it serves the community,"was typical of peoples' views. The Post Office was considered to be a friendly centre for information.It was very well run and a great benefit to a rural area lacking in good transport facilities to the nearest city of Elgin which is 4km away.
